scripts.migrate:dev: yarn run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/database/setup.js --migrate
scripts.migrate:prod: yarn run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./dist/database/setup.js --migrate
scripts.pm2:start:prod: yarn run build && pm2 startOrRestart ./internals/pm2/ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.rollback:dev: yarn run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/database/setup.js --rollback
scripts.seed:dev: yarn run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/database/setup.js --seed
scripts.start:dev: yarn run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/app.js
scripts.start:prod: yarn run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./dist/app.js
